item.title: Getting started with javafx-8
item.description: Instalating Guide JavaFX 8 # First of all, I will use Netbeans for this tutorial and this Windows version. Intall Scene Builder: When you have installed Netbeans on your computer, you must install Gluon Scene Builder. Nowadays, Oracle does´t work with Scene Builder and they made it Open Source, to work with the Gluon versión is my recommended option. Once the program is downloaded, the instalation progess it´s easy. Once read and accepted the License Agreement and selected a destiantion folder you can pass to the next step.
